name: The Super Heroes' Super Quest
description: Hello! This is the first Full Game in the series! Hope you like it! I'm working really hard to make this a better game! This game is a Platformerish action adventure game. Here on forksphorus.https://forkphorus.github.io/#406662519 currently the game is in development ,but you can download the DEMO right now! The Full game will enter early access shortly!
